input.content:
# Lalapollaza Festival Activities üé™

Welcome to Lalapollaza! Here are some amazing activities to enjoy during the festival:

## üéµ Music & Performance
- **Main Stage Concerts** - Live performances by headlining artists
- **Acoustic Sessions** - Intimate performances in smaller venues
- **DJ Sets** - Electronic music and dance parties
- **Street Performances** - Spontaneous buskers and entertainers
- **Karaoke Tent** - Sing your heart out with friends

## üé® Arts & Crafts
- **Live Art Installations** - Watch artists create in real-time
- **Face Painting Station** - Get festival-ready with colorful designs
- **DIY Workshop Tents** - Create your own festival souvenirs
- **Photography Booths** - Professional festival photo sessions
- **Graffiti Wall** - Legal space for artistic expression

## üçï Food & Drinks
- **Food Truck Alley** - International cuisine on wheels
- **Local Brewery Tent** - Craft beer tastings
- **Smoothie & Juice Bar** - Healthy refreshments
- **Late Night Snack Stations** - Keep the energy going
- **Cooking Demonstrations** - Learn from festival chefs

## üé™ Fun Activities
- **Ferris Wheel** - Get a bird's eye view of the festival
- **Carnival Games** - Win prizes and test your skills
- **Silent Disco** - Dance to your own beat with wireless headphones
- **Yoga Sessions** - Morning stretch and meditation
- **Scavenger Hunt** - Explore the festival grounds

## üåü Special Experiences
- **VIP Lounge Access** - Exclusive relaxation area
- **Meet & Greet Sessions** - Connect with artists
- **Festival Merchandise** - Limited edition Lalapollaza gear
- **Campfire Stories** - Evening storytelling sessions
- **Sunrise Ceremony** - Start your day with intention

## üìÖ Schedule Tips
- Check the festival app for real-time updates
- Plan your must-see acts in advance
- Leave time for spontaneous discoveries
- Stay hydrated and take breaks
- Capture memories but live in the moment!

Have an amazing time at Lalapollaza! üéâ

input.content:
LALAPOLLAZA FESTIVAL PACKING CHECKLIST
=====================================

ESSENTIALS
----------
‚ñ° Festival tickets/wristband
‚ñ° ID and cash/cards
‚ñ° Phone charger/portable battery
‚ñ° Sunscreen (SPF 30+)
‚ñ° Water bottle (reusable)
‚ñ° Comfortable walking shoes
‚ñ° Rain poncho/jacket

CLOTHING
--------
‚ñ° Weather-appropriate outfits
‚ñ° Extra socks and underwear  
‚ñ° Comfortable sleeping clothes
‚ñ° Hat or cap for sun protection
‚ñ° Bandana or scarf
‚ñ° Festival fashion accessories

CAMPING GEAR (if camping)
------------------------
‚ñ° Tent and stakes
‚ñ° Sleeping bag
‚ñ° Pillow or inflatable pillow
‚ñ° Camping chair
‚ñ° Flashlight/headlamp
‚ñ° Wet wipes
‚ñ° Toiletries and medications

FUN EXTRAS
----------
‚ñ° Glow sticks or LED accessories
‚ñ° Camera for memories
‚ñ° Small backpack/fanny pack
‚ñ° Snacks and energy bars
‚ñ° Festival schedule printout
‚ñ° Trading pins or stickers
‚ñ° Good vibes and open mind!

SAFETY ITEMS
------------
‚ñ° First aid kit basics
‚ñ° Hand sanitizer
‚ñ° Emergency contact info
‚ñ° Meeting point plan with friends
‚ñ° Copy of important documents

Remember: Pack light, stay hydrated, and have fun! üéâ

Created the "lalapollaza" folder with cool festival activities! It includes:

- **festival_activities.md** - Comprehensive guide with music, arts, food, and special experiences
- **activity_schedule.json** - 3-day structured schedule with times and locations  
- **packing_checklist.txt** - Essential items to bring for the best festival experience

The folder is ready at `/Users/palash/Desktop/test/lalapollaza/`
